title: Irul
writer: Anaz Bin Ibrahim, Naseef Yusuf Izuddin, Abhiram Radhakrishnan
short_cast: Fahadh Faasil, Soubin Shahir, Darshana Rajendran
cast: Fahadh Faasil, Soubin Shahir, Darshana Rajendran
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: When a car breakdown forces a couple to seek shelter in a nearby home, conversations with the stranger inside soon suggest there’s a killer among them.
